title: This could be you next..Please read
body:
#CaseSolved!! I got unbanned. I want to thank everyone for the amazing and great support,it helped me through this so much, Thank you everyone, I just got a response from a Rioter to my ticket telling me that i got unbanned and that they sent me a compensation, i want to yet again thank everyone that helped me through this.
It seems i was telling the truth after all.
-I love this community
-I love this game
-I LOVE RIOT

That is the reply i got :
RIOT NYTH Today at 12:54
Greetings LeChatlier,

I went through the account and it seems that the new system which detect bots made a mistake in this case. I would like to thank you for patients and understanding. We always try to stay ahead of bots but this time our efforts resulted in player pain, which is the opposite of what we are trying to do.

I un-banned your account and added 10 days of IP boost to help you with catching up. Let me know if you have additional questions, welcome back to Fields of Justice.

Riot Nyth





Edit : UPDATED,Please take a look at the update at the end if you have already seen this!

5 Days ago my account got permanently suspended.
i had that account since season 3(My main account) i have never been banned or chat restricted.
and i created this account myself and lvled it to 30 on my own in about 2 month without EXP/IP boost
i sent a support ticket and they replied:
Hello LeChatlier,

Your account has been linked to suspicious activity surrounding account selling and the use of third-party programs, sometimes known as bots. Suspensions applied to accounts for this reason cannot be lifted. If you believe this ban is in error, feel free to let me know and I'll be happy to look into the matter for you. Please know, however, that it's unlikely that the decision will be reversed.

Please let me know if you have any questions.

Radkus
Player Support Specialist
"Time for a true display of skill!"


Then i followed up on that same ticket and the 2nd reply shocked me :
Hello LeChatlier,

Thank you for your patience. I went ahead and double-checked your account, and it looks like a program was used to level to 30, and then sold. This is a gross violation of our Terms of Use, so the account will have to remain suspended indefinitely. If you’d like to create your own account, we’ll be more than happy to offer you any support we can.

Radkus
Player Support Specialist
"Time for a true display of skill!"

I got shocked because i created that account and i know it's not botted.
so i told them i can prove it's not botted because i know the first champion i bought and the first skin i bought and if they track the games leading to this account lvling to 30 they will see from the scores and the ingame chat logs and the honors and other things that this is not a botted account 
but they replied :

Greetings Summoner,

I can understand your point of view but, unfortunately, we are 100% certain of this. As such, the account will remain suspended.

This decision is final.

Best regards.

Herbie28
Player Support Specialist
Riot Games

You are truly the vessels of my destruction

and i have no idea what i should do and why they can't just take a deeper look to give me justice.

One more question... What kind of bot lvls an account in 60+ days ? because that's approximately the time that took me to lvl that account, and what kind of bot doesn't purchase an EXP/IP boost ? because i never bought any of these on this account


Edit : and again they replied to me with this

Like I've previously mentioned, we are 100% certain and we consider this matter closed.

Best regards.

Herbie28
Player Support Specialist
Riot Games

You are truly the vessels of my destruction

how can they consider this matter closed ? how cruel can this get...
This is my ticket number : REQUEST #22730060


UPDATE : after i made this post i received lots of support and help from everyone here,i even got noticed by a rioter but almost 13 hrs later i get the EXACT SAME response i got on my 2nd follow up on the ticket :

MARKULUND Today at 13:38
Hello LeChatlier,

Thank you for your patience. I went ahead and double-checked your account, and it looks like a program was used to level to 30, and then sold. This is a gross violation of our Terms of Use, so the account will have to remain suspended indefinitely. If you’d like to create your own account, we’ll be more than happy to offer you any support we can.

"I made the stars to illuminate the perpetual nothing, and mortals use them for... relationship advice."

Edit : 
The weekend is almost over and the coming morning will be a business day, i still haven't gotten any official reply since the Riot WookieeCookie reply on this Thread, and i'm hoping that in the morning i will receive one.

I just want to thank everyone for the amazing support and for taking their time to look into this.
i'm still hoping that this will be solved and that i will continue to pour even more effort and time into my BELOVED! League of Legends.
I still love this game so much.
I just want to thank everyone for the great amount of support i have received.
Thank you all and Good luck on the fields of justice.
God Bless you.

replies.body:
Hey LeChatlier,

I took a look at your account and to clarify it was actioned on by a separate system then what my team did this week.  Our test was only on the North American server, while your account is on EU-West.

With that said, it looks like something may be wrong and you deserve a second look.  The EU support team is separate from us here in NA, but I'm going to reach out to my counterpart in Dublin and we'll get to the bottom of this.

I don't expect an answer, but does your system of detecting bots take into account damage dealt to champions in games? Because often that is a high indicator (not always, but just one valuable indicator) when someone is getting high cs but doing extremely low damage like 4K damage dealt to champions in a 40+ minute game, it's 9/10 times a bot. 

Because IMO it's extremely unlikely a real player would be very skilled at csing but doing barely any damage to champions the entire game.
I dont think it would be wise for Riot to discuss these kinds of things publicly because if they did, people that make the bots would know how to get around it.

Yes sir and i understand, And i'm more than just thankful that you will bring some attention to this.
it makes my heart skip a beat to know that there is still people who care for my incident.
You are amazing and i'm so happy that this caught your attention.
i love this game so much and i'm hoping when this situation is resolved my love for Riot and League of Legends will only grow greater.
Thank you so much once again.
God bless you Sir.

it's even more sad that alot of other ppl have been banned in the same ban wave,some got unbanned and they are still telling me that they are 100% certain that this season 3 account was botted to lvl 30,i asked them to check the game logs leading to this account getting to lvl 30 or even let me give them the data of what champions i bought first and stuff like that but they refused

This shit scares me.
If I lost my main account, I wouldn't have strength to make a new one.
I put so much time and effort into it (with 20 perfect rune pages, almost all champions bought and several level 7 masteries), I couldn't even imagine myself going through the XP and IP grinding again.

lol, you shouldn't have stolen if that was the case.  If your life is that bad you should do something else besides video games to improve it.

2 different Rioters already concluded that you stole from the company with skinhacks, move along.  That European attitude of what's yours is mine does NOT fly in America, now you know.

Again i will tell you that mk lol is not stealing MK only let's you and only you see the skin and doesn't really unlock it, and what you are saying is just harassment but your comment spam keeps bumbing this thread so thank you anyway

Me repeating what Riot already told you isn't harassment.  If it was my posts would be deleted and I'd be warned, this has never happened.

I'm disgusted by your poor morality and how you would try to justify using a program that steals skins for you to use ingame.

America is not Europe, you can't simply take someone elses property because you feel you are entitled to it.  This is the attitude that caused BREXIT, people don't wanna pay for people like you to steal.

Except you're not repeating what Riot told him, you're repeating things that Riot has never said and on top of that are not true. 

The problem with MKLoL has never been the ability to (client-side) use skins you haven't bought. Riot has often enough stated that purely cosmetic 3rd party programs are fine (for now). The problem with MKLoL is that it has other features that are not allowed.

Edit: That said, unless anything changed, they still issue warnings for MKLoL before banning people for it, since a lot of people do only use it for its allowed features. Meaning as long as OP stopped using it, there's no problem.

Riot has banned for MKLOL for many years now, everyone knows this and there can't be any exceptions.

The matter is 100% closed, it's time to move on.

Riot has also retroactively banned for MKLOL for years now.  I applaud this method of harsh punishment because I work with digital artists and programmers and I know how hard they struggle to make it in this type of environment.  This type of theft is especially heinous, and the fact that it isn't even addressed or apologized for is disgusting.

**NOT FOR SKIN THEFT**
Or otherwise they would ban for a lot more than just that program.
Inform yourself before you spread misinformation.

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/5dmkJinG-3rd-party-applicationsmodifications-whats-allowed-and-what-isnt

The guy is in here praising God to endear himself to American children, when he is obviously a typical European athiest and socialist who feels he is entitled to everything for free.  If he really did believe in God he wouldn't be online stealing all day.

I'd say let him back if he apologized for stealing sincerely, but if he is going to take the strategy of making a big a stink as possible so that they just give me my stuff back then I hope he catches the tyler1 style Hardware ID ban.
